column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Nymet seems troubled by something.
Obtain a Ronkan lilybell.
Deliver the carved wood earrings and the Ronkan lilybell to the girl with pigtails.
Deliver the engraven ring to Nymet.
Greetings, ally of Ronka. You have come at an opportune time. I am faced with a problem that I could use an outsider's assistance to solve.
Several days ago we sighted a young girl wandering the wood. We loosed warning arrows, and she fled back whence she came. However, she dropped these earrings in her haste.
I bear no ill will toward her, so I would like to return them, but I cannot leave. If it is not too much trouble, could you bring them to their owner?

As a sign of apology, I would like to affix a Ronkan lilybell to the earrings. They can be found growing in the woods of Yx'Maja. When you are done, please make your way to Slitherbough and find her. I believe she wore her hair in pigtails.
I apologize for requesting such a menial task from you, but as you know I have little recourse. I simply wish to put her heart at ease.
When you have affixed the earrings with the lilybell, please bring them to the young lady in Slitherbough. I pray this sets her heart at ease.
What's this? Earrings? They aren't mine, although they are pretty. If it was a necklace I might've been tempted to lie, tee hee.
Earrings? Mine have been firmly attached to my ears as far as I know. A friend of mine was lamenting over something she had lost, however...
Hmm? A pair of earrings? It just so happens I lost my own while in the woods some time ago...
You didn't! You found them! And the lilybell is a masterful touch!
That Viis asked you to do this? I...I suppose she didn't mean me harm after all...
It is as Master Matoya said. They uphold their duty as the wood's protectors with grave severity. They only reacted as they should have.
Please, give this ring to the one who sent you. Tell her I apologize for my rudeness, and will be more careful when next I go into the woods.
Please give my ring to the Viis by way of apology. It's the least I can give after I encroached upon their sacred space.
You have returned. Did you find the girl?
I see. She is kind as well as wise. I shall hang this ring from my neck as a keepsake, to remind me of her. You have my gratitude for everything you have done.
